mapper.select: select g.id as id, g.image_address as imageUrl, g.name as name, g.category as category, f.name as origin, (gn.number-gn.sale_number) as number, gn.unit as numberUnit, gp.number as price, gp.unti as priceUnit from recommend_goods rg left join goods g on g.id=rg.goods_id left join farmers f on f.id=g.origin_id left join goods_number gn on gn.goods_id=g.id left join goods_price gp on gp.goods_id=g.id where rg.recommend_id=#{recommendId} and rg.if_on=1 and g.if_delete=0

select g.id as id, g.image_address as imageUrl, g.name as name, g.category as category, f.name as origin, (gn.number-gn.sale_number) as number, gn.unit as numberUnit, gp.number as price, gp.unti as priceUnit from goods g left join farmers f on f.id=g.origin_id left join goods_number gn on gn.goods_id=g.id left join goods_price gp on gp.goods_id=g.id where g.category=#{category} and g.if_delete=0
